 2009-15402009-09-09,  ,  ,  CRA,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectÉvasion Hors Piste Inc. Remission Order
PrecisRemission Order remits tax in the amount of $34,487.88 to Évasion Hors Piste Inc., and all relevant penalties and interest on it, in respect of the sale of the sale of recreational vehicles to non-residents during the period beginning on September 1, 2001 and ending on February 28, 2003.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2009-0089 Publication Date: 2009-09-30
AttachmentsAttachment
